Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Melbourne Avenue, west of a number of small shops.
Room.LongDescription: Melbourne Avenue is one of the most popular streets in Oceancrest because it runs past all the various shops and facilities located in the south- eastern section of town. On the east, you can see the Royal Jousting Supplies shop where a number of polearms and other jousting weapons may be purchased for general use or training. Since this is the poorer section of town, you can't expect much here to be of that great of quality.
